page.title: 12GOLDHANGER - MALDON ROAD
page.content: Maldon Road is the base of a triangle with the Square as the apex.Maldon Road is called Maldon Road because it leads into Maldon. Many of the buildings along Maldon Road are at the edge of a council estate called Hall estate.In Maldon Road there is a Post Office _Cum_Shop. Maldon Road runs through a lot of farmland.Maldon Road is the main road in to Goldhanger.At the end of Maldon Road there is a bridge called Wash Bridge.It is called Wash Bridge because I think it is where people used to wash in the olden days if they had no water.
